FLEX-SIZE

.no-shrink

.no-shrink is a container property, it will make children no wrap.

ELEMENT A is called Alice
ELEMENT B is called Bob
ELEMENT C is called Charlie
ELEMENT D is called David
ELEMENT E is called Eric
ELEMENT F is called Frank

Without .no-shrink

Without .no-shrink, if width of elements over parent width, flex system will calcaluate each element a new width for.

ELEMENT A is called Alice
ELEMENT B is called Bob
ELEMENT C is called Charlie
ELEMENT D is called David
ELEMENT E is called Eric
ELEMENT F is called Frank

.no-self-shrink

You can set specific element no shrink with .no-self-shrink

ELEMENT A is called Alice
ELEMENT B is called Bob
ELEMENT C is called Charlie
NOBODY CAN SHRINK ME!
ELEMENT E is called Eric
ELEMENT F is called Frank

.is-fill

This is very useful if you want a element fill the remain space of container

FILL ALL SPACE
ELEMENT A
ELEMENT B
ELEMENT C
ELEMENT D
ELEMENT E

[acss-flex]
